AddResourceTag.document: This API is used to associate resources with tags.
AddResourceTag.name: Associating Resources and Tags

AttachResourcesTag.document: This API is used to associate a tag with multiple resources.
AttachResourcesTag.name: Associates tag with resources in batches

CreateTag.document: This API is used to create a tag key and tag value pair.
CreateTag.name: Creating Tags

DeleteResourceTag.document: This API is used to unassociate tags and resources.
DeleteResourceTag.name: Unassociating Resources and Tags

DeleteTag.document: This API is used to delete a tag key and tag value pair.
DeleteTag.name: Deleting Tags

DescribeResourceTags.document: This API is used to query the tags associated with a resource.
DescribeResourceTags.name: Queries tags associated with resource

DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIds.document: This API is used to query tag key and value pairs for existing resources.
DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIds.name: Querying Tags Associated with a Resource

DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIdsSeq.document: This API is used to view the tags associated with a resource in sequence.
DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIdsSeq.name: Views tags associated with resource in sequence

DescribeResourceTagsByTagKeys.document: This API is used to get resource tags based on tag keys.
DescribeResourceTagsByTagKeys.name: Gets resource tags based on tag keys

DescribeResourcesByTags.document: This API is used to query resources by tags.
DescribeResourcesByTags.name: Queries resources by tags

DescribeResourcesByTagsUnion.document: This API is used to query resource list by tags.
DescribeResourcesByTagsUnion.name: Queries resource list by tags

DescribeTagKeys.document: This API is used to query tag keys in an existing tag list.
DescribeTagKeys.name: Querying Tag Keys

DescribeTagValues.document: This API is used to query tag values in an existing tag list.
DescribeTagValues.name: Querying Tag Values

DescribeTagValuesSeq.document: This API is used to query tag values in a created tag list.
DescribeTagValuesSeq.name: Queries tag values in sequence

DescribeTags.document: This API is used to query existing tag lists.
DescribeTags.name: Querying Tag Lists

DescribeTagsSeq.document: This API is used to query the created tag lists.
DescribeTagsSeq.name: Queries tag lists in sequence

DetachResourcesTag.document: This API is used to unbind a tag from multiple resources.
DetachResourcesTag.name: Unbinds tag from resources in batches

ModifyResourceTags.document: This API is used to modify all tags associated with a resource.
ModifyResourceTags.name: Batch Modifying Tags Associated with a Resource

ModifyResourcesTagValue.document: This API is used to modify the tag value corresponding to a tag key associated with multiple resources.
ModifyResourcesTagValue.name: Modifies tag value associated with resources in batches

UpdateResourceTagValue.document: This API is used to modify the values of tags associated with a resource (the tag key does not change).
UpdateResourceTagValue.name: Modifying Resource Tag Values

members.document: Tag key. Either exists or does not exist alongside the tag value. If it does not exist, all of the user's tags will be queried.
members.name: TagKey

members.document: Tag value. Either exists or does not exist alongside the tag key. If it does not exist, all of the user's tags will be queried.
members.name: TagValue

members.document: Data offset. The default value is 0. Must be an integral multiple of the `Limit` parameter.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Page size. The default value is 0.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Creator `Uin`. If not specified, `Uin` is only used as the query condition.
members.name: CreateUin

members.document: Tag key array, which either exists or does not exist with the tag value. If it does not exist, all tags of the user will be queried. If it is passed in together with `TagKey`, it will be used and the `TagKey` will be ignored.
members.name: TagKeys

members.name: TagValue

members.document: Data offset. Default value: 0. It must be an integer multiple of the `Limit` parameter
members.name: Offset

members.document: Number of entries per page. Default value: 15
members.name: Limit

members.document: Creator `Uin`. If this parameter is blank or left empty, only `Uin` will be used as a condition for query
members.name: CreateUin

members.document: Tag key array, which either exists or does not exist with the tag value. If it does not exist, all tags of the user will be queried. If it is passed in together with `TagKey`, it will be used and the `TagKey` will be ignored.

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The tags to be added or modified. If the resource described by `Resource` is not associated with the input tag keys, an association will be added. If the tag keys are already associated, the values corresponding to the associated tag keys will be modified to the input values. This API must contain either `ReplaceTags` or `DeleteTag`. And these two parameters cannot include the same tag keys.
members.name: ReplaceTags

members.document: The tags to be unassociated. This API must contain either `ReplaceTags` or `DeleteTag`. And these two parameters cannot include the same tag keys.
members.name: DeleteTags
